dbConnClose() - Method in dbUtils
Closes Database Connection.
dbConnEstablish(String) - Method in dbUtils
Creates a Database Connection Object to Interact with the Database.
dbConnExecuteQuery(String, String) - Method in dbUtils
Executes a 'Select' SQL query provided by the user and returns a String Array.
dbConnExecuteQuerySingleRow(def, String) - Method in dbUtils
Executes a 'Select' SQL query provided by the user and returns a String Array containing a single row.
dbConnExecuteUpdate(def, String) - Method in dbUtils
Performs an Update operation on the Database based on the SQL query provided by the user.
dbConnGet() - Method in dbUtils
Provides a Database connection object to the user.
dbConnReturnColumnValue(String, String, String) - Method in dbUtils
Executes a 'Select' SQL query provided by the user and returns result set with complete Column name and value.
dbUtils - Class in dbUtils
Provides Utilities to Interact with a Oracle Database.
dbUtils(def, def) - Constructor in dbUtils
Creates a new dbUtils object with the ability to connect to a specified Oracle Database as well as write to SoapUI Log.
DeleteFromDB(String, String) - Method in dbUtils
Performs a Delete operation on the Database based on the SQL query provided by the user.
